description: Try our easy to follow Mango Chutney recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango Chutney Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add mango, vinegar and sugar and cook, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes or until chutney is reduced. Transfer to a sterilised jar and seal.
